original_title: I Am a Schizophrenic and So Am I
overview: After one of Dr. Ravi's (Ravi Godse) patients commits suicide, supposedly due to his negligence, media outlets and the public begin vilifying him. As scrutiny into his life intensifies, Ravi struggles to protect his good name and maintain his grip on reality. An entertaining tale about a successful immigrant's battle for respect in America, this indie comedy co-stars Lisa Klein, Mark Thompson and Marlana Dunn.
title: I Am a Schizophrenic and So Am I
